pages.text: The Crafter can be used to automatically craft blocks and items. The top tier version supports up to 8 different recipes$(br2)There are 26 input slots (for ingredients) and 4 output slots

It is possible to $(l)Remember$() the contents of the slots with the R button. That way an input or output slot can only contain that specific item. Use the F button to forget this again$(br2)$(5)Infusing$() this machine reduces the power usage$(br2)The crafter supports the $(l:rftoolsbase:tools/filtermodule)Filter Module$(/l)
